page.title: 19Local Opinions.
page.content:
The building of a{Community Centre}in Pensilva has caused a lot of argument about the amenities in the village. We made a short questionnaire to test people's opinions. We received 86 replies out of 100 forms. The results were :
{Q. Are you in favour of a community {centre being built ? YES 92% NO 8% {Q. Why are you for/against the idea ? Something for young people 39% Improve community spirit 27% More local amenities 23% Present buildings too small 8%
Those against the idea felt that either there was no need, no community spirit or no money.
